value:
$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|So, you're saying you dance in
service of the gods? In that case,
listen well, young one...$k$pI grant you permission to serve as my
personal bodyguard until Sigrun and
Tanith arrive.$k$pYou should feel honored for the
opportunity.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニニアン,ch03_16_Ninian_F_Wedding18,Face|I take that to mean...you'll fight by my
side? Thank you very much.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|I've never worn such an outfit, even if
just for a festival... I suppose I'll get
your opinion. For reference.$k$pHow do I look? Do I have a certain...
Grown-up air about me? Or perhaps
a, um... A "feminine charm"?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニニアン,ch03_16_Ninian_F_Wedding18,Face|Yes, I think you look quite nice. It suits
you well.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|Y-you think so? Truly? *ahem*$k$pI see. In that case, our opponents
should think themselves lucky for the
chance to see me in this.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|Hmpf... I will withdraw for now, but
next we meet I will show you the full
power of my— Ouch!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニニアン,ch03_16_Ninian_F_Wedding18,Face|Are you all right? It looks like you
tripped on the hem of your dress. You
need to raise it when you—$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|I-I know that already!$k$p$Sbs150|
